registrationStatus.description: If specified, only users whose registration status is registered or anon will be counted/shown.

registrationAgeAtLeast.description: If specified, only users whose registration age is at least the specified days at the requested data will be counted/shown.

registrationAgeAtMost.description: If specified, only users whose registration age is at most the specified days at the requested data will be counted/shown.

inAnyUserGroups.description: If specified, only users who belong to any of the specified groups will be counted/shown.

inAllUserGroups.description: If specified, only users who belong to all of the specified groups will be counted/shown.

notInAnyUserGroups.description: If specified, only users who do not belong to any of the specified groups will be counted/shown.

notInAllUserGroups.description: If specified, only users who do not belong to all of the specified groups will be counted/shown.

hasAnyUserPageTemplates.description: If specified, only users whose user/talk page has any of the specified templates embedded will be counted/shown.

hasAllUserPageTemplates.description: If specified, only users whose user/talk page has any of the specified templates embedded will be counted/shown.

notHasAnyUserPageTemplates.description: If specified, only users whose user/talk page does not have any of the specified templates embedded will be counted/shown.

notHasAllUserPageTemplates.description: If specified, only users whose user/talk page does not have all of the specified templates embedded will be counted/shown.

totalEditsAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with at least this amount of total edits at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalEditsAtMost.description: If specified, only users with at most this amount if total edits at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalEditsMilestoneReachedInPeriod.description: If specified, users who reach this number of total edits in the selected period will be counted/shown.

inPeriodEditsAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with edits at least this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

inPeriodEditsAtMost.description: If specified, only users with edits at most this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalEditsWithChangeTagAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with at least this amount of total edits with a given change tag/given change tags at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalEditsWithChangeTagAtMost.description: If specified, only users with at most this amount if total edits with a given change tag/given change tags at the requested date will be counted/shown.

inPeriodEditsWithChangeTagAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with edits with a given change tag/given change tags at least this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

inPeriodEditsWithChangeTagAtMost.description: If specified, only users with edits with a given change tag/given change tags at most this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalRevertedEditsAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with at least this amount of total reverted edits at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalRevertedEditsAtMost.description: If specified, only users with at most this amount of total reverted edits at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalRevertedEditsMilestoneReachedInPeri.description: If specified, users who reach this number of total reverted edits in the selected period will be counted/shown.

inPeriodRevertedEditsAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with reverted edits at least this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

inPeriodRevertedEditsAtMost.description: If specified, only users with reverted edits at most this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalReceivedThanksAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with at least this amount of received thanks at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalReceivedThanksAtMost.description: If specified, only users with at most this amount of received thanks at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalReceivedThanksMilestoneReachedInPer.description: If specified, users who reach this number of total received thanks in the selected period will be counted/shown.

inPeriodReceivedThanksAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with received thanks at least this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

inPeriodReceivedThanksAtMost.description: If specified, only users with received thanks at most this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalActiveDaysAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with at least this amount of active days at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalActiveDaysAtMost.description: If specified, only users with at most this amount of active days at the requested date will be counted/shown.

totalActiveDaysMilestoneReachedInPeriod.description: If specified, users who reach this number of total active days in the selected period will be counted/shown.

inPeriodActiveDaysAtLeast.description: If specified, only users with active days at least this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.

inPeriodActiveDaysAtMost.description: If specified, only users with active days at most this amount in the specified days before the requested date will be counted/shown.
